item.description:
The Unconquered Shield are a legendary and mysterious company of adventurers that seem to come out of nowhere and save the day- their centuries-long history is an unbroken string of victories. Now they have returned- and they seem to be at the heart of a conspiracy to overthrow the rightful government of King’s Watch! What caused this apparent change of heart? Can anyone stand against warriors undefeated for the duration of their long history? Take on the roll of a fantasy hero and find out in this 2-hour long adventure designed for ages 10 and up. Solve the mystery, battle the villains, save the day!

Call us at 781-270-4800 to pre-register; $15/member, $20/nonmember.
item.name: Adventure Night: Unconquered
